text:
@WhiteHouse Interesting.

USA has 1million COVID19 cases.

The WHO, who properly advised the rest of the world, reports the rest of the world is flattening the curve.

Maybe you should have listened to the WHO in the beginning.

This is YOUR failure.
#TrumpFailedAmerica #TrumpFailed
